text: Nandao ni meiyou kanjian nage ren ma? Zhenzhu ba guo quan shangci ta, gu ta yu yi bo la xin zhenglun ta de zhu. Dangshi, yi bo la xin shuo:“Wo de zhu neng shi sizhe sheng, neng shi sheng zhe si.” Ta shuo:“Wo ye neng shi sizhe sheng, neng shi sheng zhe si.” Yi bo la xin shuo:“Zhenzhu dique neng shi taiyang cong dongfang sheng qi, ni shi ta cong xifang sheng qi ba.” Nage buxindao de ren, jiu ya kou wu yanle. Zhenzhu bu yindao bu yi de minzhong
